name: Garlock Online
description: Start your adventure with your friends in Garlock Online, collect items, match up with different types of monsters , collect archivements. build, recruit and improve the monsters who will stay on your side in battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 4130 3.4 GHZ / AMD FX-4100 Quad-Core Processor 3.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 450 gts 1gb (resolution 1280x1024) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible or onboard chipset Additional Notes: Mouse + Tastertur
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or better Processor: amd fx-8120 8x 3100 mhz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650 gtx 2gb or better (resolution 1920x1080) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible or onboard chipset Additional Notes: Mouse + Tastertur
